statements: SELECT * FROM backup_copies WHERE backup_id = 1;
SELECT file_name, size_in_bytes FROM backup_copies WHERE size_in_bytes > 1000;
SELECT * FROM backup_copies WHERE backup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT file_name, Backup_location FROM backup_copies WHERE Backup_location LIKE '%Main%';
SELECT backup_id, size_in_bytes, backup_date FROM backup_copies ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_copies WHERE size_in_bytes > 10000 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, size_in_bytes FROM backup_copies WHERE backup_location = 'Cloud' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT backup_id, file_name, backup_date FROM backup_copies WHERE size_in_bytes < 5000 AND Backup_location != 'External' ORDER BY file_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT Backup_location FROM backup_copies WHERE backup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT file_name, size_in_bytes, DATE_FORMAT(backup_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS formatted_date FROM backup_copies WHERE size_in_bytes BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY formatted_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM critical_data_backups
SELECT backup_name, backup_timestamp FROM critical_data_backups
SELECT backup_name, backup_size FROM critical_data_backups WHERE backup_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, backup_name, backup_timestamp FROM critical_data_backups ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM disaster_recovery_logs WHERE success = TRUE
SELECT * FROM critical_data_backups WHERE backup_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_name, backup_timestamp FROM critical_data_backups ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_size FROM critical_data_backups WHERE backup_size > 1000 ORDER BY backup_size DESC;
SELECT c.backup_name, d.success FROM critical_data_backups c JOIN disaster_recovery_logs d ON c.id = d.backup_id WHERE d.success = TRUE;
SELECT c.backup_name, d.error_message FROM critical_data_backups c LEFT JOIN disaster_recovery_logs d ON c.id = d.backup_id WHERE d.error_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.backup_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM backup_data;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name FROM backup_data ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs WHERE recovery_status = 'Successful';
SELECT audit_id, audit_timestamp, SUBSTRING(audit_details, 1, 50) AS truncated_details FROM security_audit;
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE backup_size > 1000 ORDER BY backup_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE backup_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY backup_size DESC;
SELECT backup_name, backup_timestamp, backup_size FROM backup_data WHERE backup_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM recovery_logs WHERE recovery_status = 'successful' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_timestamp, LEFT(audit_details, 50) AS short_details FROM security_audit;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_size FROM backup_data WHERE backup_size BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY backup_timestamp;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM backup_users;
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_name, balance FROM backup_wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type, timestamp FROM backup_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_type, log_timestamp FROM backup_logs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM backup_wallets JOIN backup_users ON backup_wallets.user_id = backup_users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM backup_users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM backup_users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT wallet_name, balance FROM backup_wallets WHERE balance > 10000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM backup_transactions WHERE amount < 0 AND transaction_type = 'debit' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_type, log_timestamp FROM backup_logs WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM backup_users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM backup_users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM backup_settings WHERE setting_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM backup_transactions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM backup_logs WHERE log_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_time;
SELECT id, username, email FROM backup_users;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM backup_transactions ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, wallet_balance FROM backup_wallets WHERE wallet_balance > 1000;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_time FROM backup_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT setting_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM backup_settings ORDER BY setting_name ASC;
